RACE.RACE_TEXT: Evangeline Downs Futurity Trial EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 400 Y Dirt CR: 87. Futurity Trial Purse 5000. FOR TWO YEAR OLD QUARTER HORSES WHICH WERE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE TO THE 2023 EVD FUTURITY. $600 to enter trials. All payments must be on account with the horsemen's bookkeeper prior to 10:30 a.m. morning of entries. Supplemental payments of $5,000 will be accepted at time of entry which must be paid to Horsemen's Bookkeeper - Cash or Cashier's Check accepted only. Weight: 124 lbs. (*All horse nominated to this race are subject to substance testing (Hair Testing) as outlined by the LQHBA. Refer to www.lqhba.com or www.evangelinedowns.com).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SEPARATE BUTALLRIGHT bump brk, big finish. APOLLITICAL IKE broke out, outkicked. THELOUISIANACOWGIRL early bump, up show. SPECIAL ROYAL ZIPPER brk in, bump, empty. SAN LORENZITA brk out,bump,gave way. APOLLITICAL RISE floated out break. LL EYSA JESS CARTER broke in, bump. SHEZA NITE HAWK faded rail.

ENTRY.NAME: Thelouisianacowgirl
ENTRY.OWNER: Mc Horse Sale Track and Supply LLC

RACE.FOOTNOTES: JESS JUMPN DYNASTY cruised midtrack. HEAVENLY SNOW EAGLE hopped start,rallied. LGM FLIRTING HERO drfited out, best rest. SERIOUS EAGLE RISING floated out midway. MY FAVORITE TEJANITA chased early, faltered. ALI FAVORITE remained back rail.

ENTRY.NAME: Jess Jumpn Dynasty
ENTRY.OWNER: Jose Estrada Quarter Horses and Silva Jeronimo

RACE.FOOTNOTES: B SECOND COWBOY brk sharp,held late. JB KOOL JESS chased,drift,clear 2nd. TEMPTING CELEBRATION steered out late. GABRIEL 2nd flight, widest. LETS GO BRANDEN passed tiring foes. WON FOR DA MONEY little impact. FULL MOON DYNASTI lacked bid. J CLAUD last away, faded.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: DANKESHAYNE in command outside. CORNER POCKET 123 brk back,jumped lights. ACTION REQUIRED mild rally show. POWER BY BLACK improved,flat late. JRS MAJESTIC POP POP restless,stumbled brk. COWBOY DOODLES drifted out, faded. KING VODKA finished early. CANDY BAR SA floated out midway.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNSEEN NME early brush, in time. KAS TUFF LBH luggd bit early,caught. MR PRIZE B chased,empty late. VINTAGE CANDY lacked late punch. SAMMY JOE brk thru gate,luggd in. DASH OF BLOOD slight bother early. KEEP WORKING back, steadied. SAN LORENZITOO brk into gate, trailed.

RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIRE HOT V found more btwn foes. HOLLYWOODE led late, nailed. JMG ONE HOTT EAGLE forward, clear rest. KVP ESPECIAL ducked in start. AJ CHAMPION LEGACY evenly, no bid. SAN LORENZO DREAM no real threat. LRB DYNASTY broke in air. I LIKE PRIZED BUX lunged, reared break.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 400 Y Dirt CR: 87. Trial Purse 5000. FOR TWO YEAR OLD QUARTER HORSES WHICH WERE NOMINATED AND REMAIN ELIGIBLE TO THE 2023 EVD FUTURITY. $600 to enter trials. RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIRE COWBOY fractious gate, best. CHENDO drifted in, saved 2nd. THUNDER CARTEL lugged out badly. ROCK MY HOCKS last away,improvd rail. GOAT WAGON bothered, carried out. VODKA FIRE back, bothered midway. HERMOSA CORONA gave way, vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Hermosa Corona
